triples.name: Computer-supported collaboration

triples.name: Natural-language user interface
triples.relevance: Natural language interfaces were highlighted as a presentation area, including voice interaction systems.

triples.name: Multimodal interaction

triples.name: Emotion recognition
triples.relevance: Emotion recognition supports affective interfaces that address psychological concerns like emotion and personality.

triples.name: Personality psychology

triples.name: Motivation
